sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' function UserProfile({user,deliveries}) { const [deliverlen, setDeliverylen] = useState(null) setDeliverylen(deliveries.length); return (

{user.username}

{user.first_name} {user.last_name}

{/*

{user.email}

*/}

Details

Email
{user.email}
Phone
+{user.phone_number}
date joined
{user.date_joined}
Last Login
{user.last_login}
{/*
Number of requested deliveries:
{deliverlen}
*/}
) } export default UserProfile
